_description: SRDD-guided TARGETED sigma config for Qwen2.5-1.5B-Instruct (E9a: only high-error layers)
_source: SRDD scan results from previous experiments
_notes: Only inject AQN to high-error layers (14-17): 40.8-42.7% relative error
All other layers get multiplier 0 (no AQN)
This tests whether targeted AQN can speed up training
